sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { CheckoutItemContainer, ImageContainer, TextContainer, QuantityContainer, RemoveButtonContainer } from './checkout-item.styles' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem, addItem, removeItem, clearItem}) => { const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem return(
{name}
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 ${price}
clearItem(cartItem)}> ✕
)} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem: item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
